# Architecture and Engineering Services for Detachment Renovation and Expansion

## Summary

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking a consultant and a team of sub-consultants to provide architectural services for the renovation and expansion of the Old Crow Detachment in Yukon.

## Tender Overview

*   Tender Reference Number: CB-576-26340649
*   Tender Closing Date: July 24, 2024, at 14:00:00
*   Procurement Category: Services
*   Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
*   Selection Criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

### Mandatory Requirements

*   The consultant and sub-consultants must obtain all necessary permits and approvals before commencing work.
*   The consultant is responsible for ensuring that all work meets the requirements of the RCMP's policies and regulations.
*   The consultant must comply with all applicable laws and regulations, including those related to labour, health and safety, and environmental protection.

### Tender Documents

The tender package, including all amendments and special instructions, is available for download from the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) website at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca).
